name: Sabbir Rahaman
comment: The camera is also very lightweight and easy to carry around. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone looking for a great DSLR camera.

comment: It is so easy to use and the pictures come out looking amazing. I have never been able to take such great pictures before.

comment: It was affordable and had all the features I needed to get started. The camera is easy to use and the pictures come out great!

comment: This camera is amazing! It's easy to use and the pictures come out perfect every time.

comment: This camera is amazing! The pictures come out so clear and the features are really easy to use. I'm so happy with my purchase!

comment: It's easy to use and takes great pictures. I'm really happy with my purchase!
